about_the_game:
Make your own way through the wilderness: build a cozy cabin or take your tent to discover more. Retro vibes and evergreen optimism ensoul this survival adventure featuring clever craftables, curious critters, and a handful of inspiring landmarks tucked away throughout.

Survival Gameplay

Search the world for resources and craft new items to help aid in your survival.

Frontier Living

Cultivate your frontier home base by building advanced structures like the cabin.

World Exploration

Use your tent to camp anywhere in the world, allowing you to hike to new locations.

Character Growth

Four unique archetypes will help players define their reason for being in the wilderness.

Inspiring Landmarks

Beautiful waterfalls, mysterious mines and more will break up the survival gameplay, allowing you to reflect on your time in the wild.

And More!

We'll be continuing to update this About section as we build out the features in On My Own: New Frontier, so be sure to Wishlist & Follow for the latest news updates.
